Package com.limelion.logger

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.limelion.logger.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

    A customizable logging class suitable to your needs. What can be configured right now :

    Parameter Type Default
    name String ""
    header String ""
    OUT PrintStream System.out
    ERR PrintStream System.err
    PRINTDEBUG boolean false
    PRINTNAME boolean true
    PRINTHEADER boolean true
    PRINTDATE boolean true
    PRINTLINEDESCRIPTOR boolean true
    PRINTCONSOLE boolean true
    PRINTFILE boolean true
    LOGFILE File "{rootdir}/logs/{name}_dd-MM-yyyy_HH-mm-ss.log"
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    LimelioN/LimeiloN
    See Also:
    Logger.LogParams

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Logger.LogParams
      An enum containing all the possible parameters.

      Logger​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String header, java.io.PrintStream out, java.io.PrintStream err, boolean printDebug, boolean printDate, boolean printToConsole, boolean printToFile, boolean printLineDescriptor, boolean printHeader, boolean printName, java.io.File logfile)

    • Method Detail

      • newLogger

        public static Logger newLogger​(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String header,
                               java.util.HashMap<Logger.LogParams,java.lang.Object> params)

        Cleaner way to instantiate Logger with a HashMap containing parameters

        If 'params' parameter is null, the default parameters are used, see Logger

        Parameters:
        name - String
        header - String - a header to show at start
        params - HashMap<LogParams, Object> containing parameters values
        Returns:
        a new Logger instance
        Since:
        2.0
        See Also:
        Logger, Logger.LogParams

      • debug

        public void debug​(java.lang.String debug)
        Print given message to out PrintStream specified at initialzation, preceded by [Debug]. Only prints if printDebug has been set to true.
        Parameters:
        debug -
        See Also:
        out, printDebug

      • setDebug

        public void setDebug​(boolean printDebug)
        Use this method to show or hide debug messages.
        Parameters:
        printDebug -
        See Also:
        printDebug

      • close

        public void close​()
        Use this to close this Logger instance. Will throw some exceptions if you reuse the closed object.
